item.title: Vim: Essential Commands and Quick Reference Card
item.description:
References link

Here are some useful commands that I don’t always remember:

Replace text in the current line:

 :s/original/destination/g

Replace text throughout the document:

 :%s/original/destination/g

Remove unnecessary spaces and tabs at the end of lines:

 :%s/\s\+$//

item.title: Debian: Changing Default Tools (e.g., Editor)
item.description:
A nice command exists in Debian to modify your preferences. To change the default editor, for example, do this:

 update-alternatives --config editor

Otherwise, manually, you can do this:

 export EDITOR=vim
visudo
